sections.heading: Overview
content:
Arun K. Bhunia, PhD, is an associate professor of food science at Purdue
University. He conducts research into the isolation, detection, and
identification of foodborne pathogenic microorganisms by immunological
(monoclonal antibody), tissue culture, molecular biology and biosensor based
technique.
